actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to reduce the amount of foreign earned income which is excludable from gross income.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to reduce to $37,500 the amount of foreign earned income that is excludable from gross income, effective in 1983.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to reduce the amount of foreign earned income which is excludable from gross income.
